title: Matara PS chairman arrested over arson incident
body_lines: The Chairman of the Matara Pradeshiya Sabha, Wimal Priyajanaka, has been arrested by police.
He has been arrested in connection with an alleged incident of arson at a residence in the Kekanadura area.
The Pradeshiya Sabha chairman has been released on two personal bonds of Rs. 200,000 each after being produced before the Matara Magistrate Court.
